DOC.brief_summary: A Single-arm Phase II Trial Investigating Efficacy Safety Zalutumumab Patients Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Progressive Disease Treatment Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors .
DOC.brief_title: Zalutumumab Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) Patients Refractory Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors
DOC.criteria: Patients must document disease progression TKI treatment ( verified CT scan and/or MRI accord RECIST ) . Estimated life expectancy le 3 month .
